column5: Retreat in the Pines is a beautiful oasis of peace and serenity on 30 acres of pine trees in East Texas. Two log homes, with all of the modern conveniences, can comfortably accommodate 17 guests. The two homes have four bedrooms and three full bathrooms and sleep 17 comfortably. There are two full kitchens (one in each house) and a long dining table in the main house that can seat 17 plus tableware and serving ware for all of your dining needs. There is also a washer and dryer if needed.
